response.answer_text: A sink hole has several possible definitions. A depression in the earth where the soil can literally drain down into an underground cavity or ‘hole’, effectively swallowing everything within it.A cutout in a cabinet countertop that will ultimately contain a sink. ;)A political dilemma where a policy or subject when approached, becomes a sink hole where nothing can return.A tarnished reputation so far marginalized that an individual -once equated with the topic- has entered the sink hole.

response.answer_text: These are funnel shaped hollows of varying sizes which are made in carbonate rock by the solvent action of groundwater. A sinkhole form when a caverns roof collapses or it may develop slowly as the material is dissolved and carried away in solution. It is considered the most-fundamental structure of karst topography.  (Sinkhole near Pottstown, Pa.)  (sinkhole: collapsed building A three-story building destroyed by a sinkhole, Summer Bay Resort, near Orlando, Florida, 2013.)
